content: join mc and cc for next being careful not to twist sts round of chart to sts on rh ndl work in k2 p2 ribbing until piece measures 2 25 5 5 next round co 6 sts onto rh ndl using the backwards cm loop method alternating colors as 1 st mc 1 st cc 3 times place m at end of steek sts for new beg of round work increase for body in patt as set to 7 7 8 9 9 10 sts before side m place size 35 75 91 cm next 7 7 8 9 9 10 sts on holder remove side m place next round increase k5 * m1 k10 4 times m1 k11 repeat from next 8 8 9 10 10 11 sts on the same holder pm co 6 * twice m1 k10 4 times m1 k6 224 sts sts using the backwards loop method and alternating colors as before pm work in patt as set to 6 sts of first steek pm size 38 5 98 cm work 6 steek sts to end 206 222 250 278 310 338 sts next round increase k5 m1 k11 19 times m1 k6 240 sts total 97 105 119 133 149 163 sts each for front and back 2 steeks with 6 sts each rnds beg at start of front sts size 43 5 110 5 cm next round increase k5 * m1 k10 2 times m1 k11 repeat from working steek sts in vertical stripes cont in patt as set until * 6 times more m1 k10 twice m1 k6 272 sts 28 32 36 40 44 48 rnds have been worked for the upper body ending after finishing a 4 round triangle armholes size 48 75 124 cm meas 4 4 75 5 25 5 75 6 5 7 10 12 13 5 14 5 16 5 next round increase k4 *m1 k8 m1 k9 repeat from * 14 times 18 cm more m1 k8 m1 k5 304 sts establish neck steek size 53 75 136 5 cm next round work 37 40 46 53 60 66 sts in patt pm next round increase k5 *m1 k9 m1 k10 repeat from * 14 place next 23 25 27 27 29 31 center front sts on holder times more m1 k9 m1 k5 336 sts pm co 6 sts using the backwards loop method and alternating colors pm work 37 40 46 53 60 66 sts in size 59 150 cm patt sl m work 6 armhole steek sts sl m work in patt to next round increase k5 * m1 k9 7 times m1 k10 2 times end of back sts sl m work 6 armhole steek sts 189 203 repeat from * 2 times more m1 k9 7 times m1 k10 m1 k5 229 257 287 313 sts total 37 40 46 53 60 66 sts each 368 sts side of center front 97 105 119 133 149 163 back sts 3
